resources.string: This application downloads A-GPS xtra and ntp data automatically when GPS in use. especially for GPS broken custom ROMs
No Networks are available.\nAGPS data cannot be refreshed.
AGPS data will be injected soon.
GPS is OFF.\nTurn on GPS to inject or clear AGPS data.
You can hide this app\'s icon from launcher. Mark below then will be applied on next boot. To revert this, uninstall and re-install app.
